message.body: ï¿¼Hey, could you take a look at Lucky's left front shoe when you get a chance? A nail's loose.
Go in the closet by my tack room where the radio used to be and get out the grey toolbox, there are nail pullers in there
I'm long gone but I couldn't get it out by hand
Oh, and in other news, $ has a gash on his right front leg - I washed it out. Rough day at the farm!! Thanks :)
What the heck? Were the horses out it did he cut himself in his stall?
It started to close over so I don't think it was fresh? Its a little gnarly though. Everyone was in?? Good job, ponies.
Ewe! Oh okay I was hoping they were in I didn't want them to get rained on and be cold all day :-)
Yeah gross weather! I didn't really even consider riding :/
